title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6151.2 - Privacy compliance officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6151.2 - Privacy compliance officer

State Regulations
(a) The privacy compliance officer shall be
designated by the commissioner of the Division of Criminal Justice

Services. (b) Communications shall
be addressed to: Privacy Compliance Officer, Four Tower Place, Albany, NY
12203. (c) The privacy compliance
officer is responsible for: (1)
assisting a
data subject in identifying and requesting personal information, if
necessary; (2)
describing the
contents of systems of records orally or in writing in order to enable a data
subject to learn if a system of records includes a record or personal
information identifiable to a data subject requesting such record or personal
information; (3)
taking one of the
following actions upon locating the record sought: (i) make the record available for inspection, in a printed form without codes or symbols, unless an accompanying document
explaining such codes or symbols is also provided; (ii)
permit the data subject to copy the
record; or
(iii)
deny access to the
record in whole or in part, and explain in writing the reasons therefor. Note: Records maintained pursuant to sections
837, 837-a, 837-b, 837-c, 838, 839, 845
and
845-a
of the

Executive Law are public safety agency records, as defined in article 6-A of
the Public Officers Law, and are not subject to the provisions of this Part. Any individual may review his or her criminal history record maintained by the
agency pursuant to the provisions of Part 6050 of this Title; (4)
making a copy available, upon
request, upon payment of or offer to pay established fees, if any; (5)
certifying, upon request, that a copy of
a record is a true copy; or
(6)
certifying, upon request, that: (i) the
agency does not have possession of the record sought; (ii)
the agency cannot locate the record
sought, after having made a diligent search; or
(iii)
the information sought cannot be
retrieved by use of the description thereof, or by use of the name or other
identifier of the data subject, without extraordinary search methods being
employed by the agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6151.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
